comment: # барка когда чек на LoreWarp прошел

languages.text: Под слоем копоти и грязи проступает выцарапанный в стене нечестивый символ — при взгляде на него к горлу подступает тошнота. За вами кто-то наблюдает.

traits.locale_text: Под слоем копоти и грязи проступает выцарапанный в стене нечестивый символ — при взглядпе на него, к горлу подступает тошнота. За вами кто-то наблюдает.

languages.text: Under the layer of soot and grime, you notice an unholy symbol scratched into the wall, and one look at it is enough to make you nauseous. Someone is watching you.
languages.original_text: Под слоем копоти и грязи проступает выцарапанный в стене нечестивый символ — при взгляде на него к горлу подступает тошнота. За вами кто-то наблюдает.

traits.locale_text: Someone has piled together charred human remains. These people look like they burned from inside out.
Someone has piled together charred human remains. These people look like they burned from inside out.
Someone has piled together charred human remains. These people look like they burned from the inside out.
Someone has piled together charred human remains. These people look like they burned from the inside out.
Under the layer of soot and grime, you notice an unholy symbol scratched into the wall, and one look at it is enough to make you nauseous. Someone is watching you.

languages.text: 你注意到，沾满煤烟与污垢的墙壁上画着一个邪恶的符号，光是看一眼就会让你感到恶心。有什么人在盯着你看。
languages.original_text: Under the layer of soot and grime, you notice an unholy symbol scratched into the wall, and one look at it is enough to make you nauseous. Someone is watching you.

traits.locale_text: 你注意到，沾满煤烟与污垢的墙壁上画着一个邪恶的符号，光是看一眼就会让你感到恶心。有什么人在盯着你看。

languages.text: Bajo una capa de hollín y mugre, notas un símbolo sacrílego tallado en la pared. Al mirarlo, te entran náuseas. Alguien te está vigilando.
languages.original_text: Under the layer of soot and grime, you notice an unholy symbol scratched into the wall, and one look at it is enough to make you nauseous. Someone is watching you.

traits.locale_text: Bajo una capa de hollín y mugre, notas un símbolo sacrílego tallado en la pared. Al mirarlo, te entran náuseas. Alguien te está vigilando.

languages.text: 分厚いすすや汚れの下に、壁に刻まれた不浄なシンボルに気づき、それを一目見ただけで吐き気を催した。誰かがあなたを見ている。
languages.original_text: Under the layer of soot and grime, you notice an unholy symbol scratched into the wall, and one look at it is enough to make you nauseous. Someone is watching you.

traits.locale_text: 分厚いすすや汚れの下に、壁に刻まれた不浄なシンボルに気づき、それを一目見ただけで吐き気を催した。誰かがあなたを見ている。

languages.text: Unter der Schicht aus Ruß und Dreck bemerkst du ein in die Wand gekratztes unheiliges Symbol, und ein Blick darauf genügt, um bei dir Übelkeit auszulösen. Jemand beobachtet dich.
languages.original_text: Under the layer of soot and grime, you notice an unholy symbol scratched into the wall, and one look at it is enough to make you nauseous. Someone is watching you.

traits.locale_text: Unter der Schicht aus Ruß und Dreck bemerkst du ein in die Wand gekratztes unheiliges Symbol, und ein Blick darauf genügt, um bei dir Übelkeit auszulösen. Jemand beobachtet dich.

languages.text: Sous la couche de suie et de crasse, vous remarquez un symbole impie gravé sur le mur et un seul coup d'œil suffit à vous donner la nausée. Quelqu'un vous observe.
languages.original_text: Under the layer of soot and grime, you notice an unholy symbol scratched into the wall, and one look at it is enough to make you nauseous. Someone is watching you.

traits.locale_text: Sous la couche de suie et de crasse, vous remarquez un symbole impie gravé sur le mur et un seul coup d'œil suffit à vous donner la nausée. Quelqu'un vous observe.

languages.text: İs ve kir tabakasının altında; duvara kazınmış, uğursuz bir sembol görüyorsun. Göz ucuyla bakmak bile mideni bulandırmaya yetiyor. Birisi seni izliyor.
languages.original_text: Under the layer of soot and grime, you notice an unholy symbol scratched into the wall, and one look at it is enough to make you nauseous. Someone is watching you.
